org.assertj.core.api

Class FloatArrayAssert

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.assertj.core.api.AbstractAssert<S,float[]>
      • org.assertj.core.api.AbstractFloatArrayAssert<FloatArrayAssert>
        • org.assertj.core.api.FloatArrayAssert
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ArraySortedAssert<AbstractFloatArrayAssert<FloatArrayAssert>,Float>, Assert<FloatArrayAssert,float[]>, Descriptable<FloatArrayAssert>, EnumerableAssert<AbstractFloatArrayAssert<FloatArrayAssert>,Float>, ExtensionPoints<FloatArrayAssert,float[]>

    public class FloatArrayAssert
extends AbstractFloatArrayAssert<FloatArrayAssert>
    Assertion methods for arrays of floats.

    To create an instance of this class, invoke Assertions.assertThat(float[]).

    Author:
    Yvonne Wang, Alex Ruiz, Joel Costigliola, Mikhail Mazursky, Nicolas Fran√ßois
